concept.title: Payroll by Pay Group
concept.shortdesc: From the Process Pay section of the payroll gateway, use the view By Pay Group to process a single payroll at a time. When you only have a few payrolls to process, or you need to make many edits to the payroll, process the payroll by pay group.

conbody.p: To process a single payroll, select the pay group link from the Process Pay section. The Payroll Overview page appears.

image.alt: Selecting a pay group from process pay page

conbody.p: The Payroll Overview page displays important payroll information and the processes needed to run the payroll successfully. Depending on the payroll model, your payroll has a specified list of steps for processing employee payments.

As each step is processed successfully, a green check mark appears on the left side of the step. If there was a problem, a red X appears next to the step, and you cannot move forward until the problem is resolved.

image.alt: Viewing the processing of steps on payroll overview page
